## Series

- index, value로 이루어진 데이터 구조

::: {#c3a836c0 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd

s = pd.Series(['1', 3, 5, 7, 9])
```
:::


::: {#efa85ff9 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
data = {
  'yo': {
      'hey': 300
  },
  'hey': [200, 500],
  'haha': [100, 90]
}
data = pd.Series(data)
data.name = 'what'
data.index.name = 'kiki'
data
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
```
kiki
yo      {'hey': 300}
hey       [200, 500]
haha       [100, 90]
Name: what, dtype: object
```
:::
:::
